basics.name: Thomas Rivera
basics.summary: Resourceful and detail-oriented aspiring software engineer proficient in React.js, TestCafe, and JavaScript. I excel in collaborative Agile Software Development and Issue-Driven Project Management, enabling quick and successful delivery of projects. As an Eagle Scout, I learned responsibility and leadership. I view every opportunity as a platform for learning and growth and consistently commit to excellence in all endeavors.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
University of Hawaii Leeward Community College, Pearl City, HI
education.area: AS Natural Science Information & Communication Technology
courses: ICS 111 - Introduction to Computer Science (Java Programming)
ICS 211 - Introduction to Computer Science (Data Structures)

volunteer.position: Senior Patrol Leader, Quartermaster, Den Chief
volunteer.summary: As a Cub Scout at the age of 7, I learned to appreciate the outdoors through camping and strengthen my character. At the age of 11, I became a Boy Scout. This journey has taught me many life lessons pertaining to leadership, friendship, trust, responsibility, survival skills, and moral decision-making. At 17, I achieved the Eagle rank, the highest rank in Scouting.
highlights: Developed a tutoring service for the Damien Memorial School National Honor Society, allowing students of Damien Memorial School to request and obtain tutoring services remotely.

volunteer.summary: As a member of the Damien Memorial School National Honor Society, I participated in service projects around my community and helped students through tutoring. In 2019, I became a Division Leader in charge of keeping attendance and running tutoring sessions. In 2020, I became the one of the two Co-Counsels, managing the National Honor Society.
highlights: Learned how to communicate and manage a large team.
